Title: Dawn of the Infinite
Description:
My vision is hazy, but there is no mistaking what I saw. A dark alliance opposes the bronze dragonflight. One I do not know if I shall be able to overcome...

I ask you to meet me in Eon's Fringe, $n. We will speak more of this threat there. If there is any who I would entrust with safeguarding our future, it is you.
ObjectivesText: Meet Nozdormu at Eon's Fringe in Thaldraszus.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Chromie at Eon's Fringe in Thaldraszus.
